source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Everyone is so...carefree.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Und sie leben immer noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Unafraid and unconcerned in spite of their weakness, and how easily their lives could be torn apart in an instant...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Keinen Wimpernschlag lang würden sie in einem Kampf überleben. Und doch haben sie ihren Mut nicht verloren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Such luxuries are lost to us. We have no hopes or dreams─not even the release of death. Only hunger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Wir aber haben unsere Träume und Hoffnungen längst vergessen. Wir fressen ohne Unterlass - und doch hungern wir, ohne je in die Ruhe des Todes zu gleiten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Others are a means to an end. At times a literal one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Deshalb beurteilen wir andere danach, ob sie uns als Fressen taugen oder nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>We forge covenants with men, and come here to feed. Or to die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000050_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Egal, ob man wegen des Äthers in diese Welt kommt oder wegen eines Paktes, der den Tod verheißt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I thought it would be no different when I was summoned by Zenos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Am Ende ist es einerlei. Das dachte ich, als ich hier auf Zenos' Geheiß ausgespuckt wurde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Lives were tools to him, to be used and discarded at whim. In that respect, he was a voidsent at heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Er und Fandaniel unterschieden sich nicht von uns Wesen des Nichts. Sie nutzten sich gegenseitig aus, um ihre eigenen Ziele zu erreichen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But towards you and you alone, he behaved...differently. And I cannot fathom why.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aber du bist anders. Du folgst deiner eigenen Vernunft. Das musste ich erst begreifen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What was it that drove him? What made him choose such an end?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000090_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Welch Sturm tobte in seinem Inneren? Was bedeutete ihm sein Ende?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>But enough about that man. He is dead, and we are all better for it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ach! Besser, ich denke nicht länger an diesen Kerl. Wenn ich mir auch nur sein Gesicht vorstelle, kommt es mir bitter hoch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why are you here? Was there something you needed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000110_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Warum bist du eigentlich hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So you're heading back now. Then as per our bargain, I will go as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Du willst wieder aufbrechen, ja? Dann werde ich mich an meinen Pakt halten und mitkommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000130_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Everyone is here? Good. Let us set forth for the void once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000130_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So, dann wären wir also bereit. Versuchen wir es noch einmal: Auf ins Nichts, wo meine Schwester wartet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000140_ESTINIEN<tab>Was ist los? Worauf wartest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>He's...calling.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000150_ESTINIEN<tab>Das ist doch ... der Ruf eines Drachen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000160_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What is the meaning of this...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000160_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Keine Antwort ... Was hat das zu bedeuten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Unless I'm mistaken, that was intended for one of your kin. Who?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000170_YSHTOLA<tab>Das will ich dich fragen. Der Ruf eines Drachen hallt durch den Äther und dringt zu all seinen Artgenossen, egal wo sie sich befinden. Wen hast du gerufen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000180_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>It was for the briefest of moments, but...I felt her. Azdaja.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000180_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich habe sie gespürt. Es war ... meine Schwester!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000190_ESTINIEN<tab>I thought she was in the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000190_ESTINIEN<tab>Aber Azdaja ist doch im Nichts!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000200_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As did I. Yet the presence was unmistakable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000200_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ja. Aber es war ihre Ätherresonanz, ganz sicher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000210_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Thus did I call out...only for it to fade and vanish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000210_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich habe versucht, nach ihr zu rufen, aber da war sie schon weg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps...she crossed over to the Source then immediately turned back?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000220_YSHTOLA<tab>War sie hier im Ursprung und ist dann sofort wieder in die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt zurückgekehrt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I do not know...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich weiß es nicht ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000240_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Could she have found a way home...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000240_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>War sie wirklich wieder hier? Aber wie soll das möglich sein?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>The how of it aside, if she was indeed in the Source, there may be clues where she came through that could lead us back to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>Das ist jetzt nicht die Frage. Wenn sie auch nur für kurze Zeit in der Ursprungs<var 16 /var>welt war, müsste eine Spur zu finden sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>Where exactly was it that you felt her presence?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000260_YSHTOLA<tab>Wo hast du ihre Präsenz gespürt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000270_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Far to the north. That was all I could discern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000270_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Von weit weg, in nördlicher Richtung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000280_ESTINIEN<tab>The north, you say? Beyond the Bounty─Garlemald?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000280_ESTINIEN<tab>Dann wissen die Garlear vielleicht etwas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>As good a place to start as any.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>Ja. Wir sollten uns sofort nach Hinweisen umhören und versuchen, Azdaja zu finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>My apologies, Zero, but your return to the void will have to wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000300_YSHTOLA<tab>Es tut mir leid, aber deine Rückkehr in den dreizehnten Splitter wird noch etwas warten müssen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I told you before that I have no reason to go back there. Do as you will.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Schon gut. Ich habe ohnehin keinen dringenden Grund, dahin zurückzukehren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>...All right. I presume you wish to stay here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han until we return?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000320_YSHTOLA<tab>Würdest du bitte in Radz-at-Han warten, bis wir wieder zurück sind?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You've kept me amply fed. I wouldn't be averse to helping you on your search.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000330_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Seit ich hier bin, habe ich viel Äther aufgenommen. Ich könnte euch bei der Suche behilflich sein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>If Azdaja was indeed here, other voidsent may have made the journey as well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>Wenn Azdajas Präsenz hier zu spüren war, könnte das bedeuten, dass im Nichts irgendetwas im Gange ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, we would welcome your company.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000350_YSHTOLA<tab>Einverstanden. Du kommst mit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000360_ESTINIEN<tab>If it's decided, then I'll contact our associates in Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000360_ESTINIEN<tab>Gut, dass ich die Kontaktperle noch nicht weggeworfen habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000370_ESTINIEN<tab>...It's me. Still talking everyone's ears off, I trust?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000370_ESTINIEN<tab>Ich bin es ... Ja ... Ich möchte dich etwas fragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000380_ESTINIEN<tab>Understood. We'll see you there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000380_ESTINIEN<tab>Gut, verstanden. Warte dort, wir kommen sofort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000390_ESTINIEN<tab>We're to rendezvous at Tertium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000390_ESTINIEN<tab>Mein Informant erwartet uns im Tertium.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000400_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll need to teleport to make it there in time. Can you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000400_ESTINIEN<tab>Wir werden einen Transportzauber benutzen. Was machst du? Die Strecke ist etwas zu weit, um sie zu Fuß zu gehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Aye. I know it well from my time as an avatar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000410_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Mein Körper kann durchaus von Teleportmagie Gebrauch machen. Und Garlemald ist mir nicht unbekannt. Das ist schließlich, wo Zenos herkam.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000420_ESTINIEN<tab>Then it seems we're all set.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000420_ESTINIEN<tab>Gut, dann bin ich beruhigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>If there is nothing else, let us see to our final preparations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>Wir brechen auf, sobald alle bereit sind. Nächster Halt: Tertium!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>Any moment now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000440_ESTINIEN<tab>So, da wären wir. Aber wo ist das Begrüßungskomitee?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>My friends, 'tis good to see you again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hallo, meine Freunde. Wir haben uns ja lange nicht gesehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>And you. I was worried that the cold wouldn't agree with you, but you're both looking quite well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>Das kann man wohl sagen. Ich hatte schon Sorge, dass euch die Kälte auf Dauer zusetzen würde, aber es macht nicht den Anschein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000470_ALISAIE<tab>You get used to it. It helps that there's no shortage of fuel and heaters like before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000470_ALISAIE<tab>Ganz und gar nicht! Wir haben uns gut an das Klima gewöhnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000480_YSHTOLA<tab>Glad to hear it. Have you been working in Garlemald all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000480_YSHTOLA<tab>Schön. Und ihr wart wirklich die ganze Zeit über hier, um den Leuten zu helfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have. Though the worst is behind them, the people still have a long road ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ja. Auch ohne die Katastrophe der Letzten Tage ist das Leben hier draußen hart und unerbittlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000500_ALPHINAUD<tab>They've taken steps towards forming an interim government, but it will be some time before any large-scale reconstruction effort can be carried out in earnest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Übergangsregierung befindet sich auf einem guten Wege, aber das gebeutelte Garlemald wieder auf solide Beine zu stellen, ist kein leichtes Unterfangen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>With the nation in ruins and the leadership void yet to be filled, there remains a lack of direction─a pervasive sense of aimlessness and worry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Die Garlear haben ihren Kaiser und eine gut funktionierende Ge<var 16 /var>sell<var 16 /var>schaft verloren. Das rüttelt an den Grundfesten ihres Selbst<var 16 /var>be<var 16 /var>wusst<var 16 /var>seins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000520_ALISAIE<tab>So we'll keep doing what we can until they can finally stand on their own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000520_ALISAIE<tab>Aber wir geben unser Bestes und helfen, wo wir nur können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Still, everyone wants to make things better, and we're here to help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000530_ALISAIE<tab>Aber jeder tut etwas, um die Situation zu verbessern. Und wir, wir helfen natürlich, so gut wir nur können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000540_ALISAIE<tab>A lot of Garleans wanted nothing to do with us, but they're starting to come around. Slowly but surely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000540_ALISAIE<tab>Natürlich gibt es auch Garlear, die uns gegenüber misstrauisch sind. Aber mehr und mehr nehmen unsere Hilfe an.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing a fine job.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ihr seid die Besten!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It sounds like quite the undertaking.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Klingt ziemlich anstrengend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>You're too kind. But it's thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls that we've been able to make any progress.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Danke. Du weißt ja: Solange man zusammenhält, kommt man auch weiter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, it has not been easy. But we've been able to make progress thanks to the cooperation of like-minded souls.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Leicht ist es nicht. Ehrlich gesagt weiß ich nicht, wie lange ich ohne den Beistand unserer Verbündeten durchgehalten hätte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>The allied nations continue to send supplies which allow us to meet basic needs such as food and shelter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000570_ALPHINAUD<tab>Über das Ilsabard-Korps erreichen uns Hilfsgüter aus allen Ecken und Enden der Welt. Dank dieser Unterstützung konnten wir den Kopf über Wasser halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Meanwhile, Jullus and a number of soldiers have begun a restoration initiative, with more and more volunteers joining by the day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus hat erreicht, dass sich Teile der ehemaligen garleischen Streitkräfte an dem Aufbau des Landes beteiligen. Der Kreis der willigen Helfer wird immer größer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000590_ALISAIE<tab>Like Alphinaud said, they've got a long road ahead of them. But we'll get there together─one step at a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000590_ALISAIE<tab>Der Weg ist noch lang, aber wir kommen Schritt für Schritt voran.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though you yourself helped them take one especially big step, didn't you? In vanquishing that blasphemy in the Tower of Babil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wie läuft es bei dir? Hast du die Blasphemität besiegt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. I can only hope that your deed will help the people to find peace and closure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Danke. Damit ist die Ver<var 16 /var>zweif<var 16 /var>lung der Garlear zwar nicht per se beseitigt, aber sie dürfen sich nun etwas sicherer fühlen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000620_ALISAIE<tab>But enough about events here. What brings you to us? And with new company besides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000620_ALISAIE<tab>Aber was macht ihr eigentlich hier? Ein neues Gesicht ist ja auch dabei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>This may take rather a long time to explain, but bear with me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000630_YSHTOLA<tab>Das ist schnell erzählt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000640_ALISAIE<tab>The Thirteenth!? After traveling to the edge of existence, I thought you'd keep your escapades closer to home for a while...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000640_ALISAIE<tab>Kaum bist du vom Rande des Universums zurückgekehrt, da zieht es dich schon wieder in eine Splitter<var 16 /var>welt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000650_ALISAIE<tab>But I suppose there's no stopping you. Not that I'm one to talk, of course...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000650_ALISAIE<tab>Und dann noch die dreizehnte. Gönnst du dir denn nie eine Ruhepause?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was soll man machen? Er ist eben Abenteurer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>The heart of an adventurer cannot be denied.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Was soll man machen? Sie ist eben Abenteurerin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000680_ALISAIE<tab>You could have at least invited me too! Surely there was room enough for me and G'raha in the undersea vault?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000680_ALISAIE<tab>Ich weiß. Aber es wäre doch schön gewesen, davon zu wissen. Vielleicht hätten wir ja helfen können. Stattdessen darf Raha den Boden des Myriadenmeers erkunden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sorry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tut mir echt leid, Alisaie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were busy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich dachte nur, ihr hättet so viel zu tun ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000690_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, it's fine. You can make it up to me on the next one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000690_ALISAIE<tab>Schon gut. Aber das nächste Mal sagst du etwas eher Bescheid, einverstanden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000700_ALISAIE<tab>I know, I know. I only meant to tease. Mostly...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000700_ALISAIE<tab>Schon gut! Ich weiß ja, dass du es nur gut meinst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>But on a more serious note... Are we sure it's wise to keep Zenos's former avatar around?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000710_ALISAIE<tab>Soso. Du warst also eine von Zenos gesteuerte Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000720_ALISAIE<tab>I understand how you came to work together, but nevertheless...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000720_ALISAIE<tab>Na ja, wenn Y'shtola meint, dass wir dir vertrauen können ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're right to be cautious. I'm a voidsent after all. But do not conflate me with Zenos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000730_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich verstehe, dass du misstrauisch bist. Aber setze mich nicht mit Zenos gleich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To recall my time in his service─it...angers me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Wenn ich nur daran denke, wie er mich kontrolliert hat, beginnt mein Blut zu kochen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Is that so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Hmmm ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>I think we'll get along just fine, you and I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000760_ALISAIE<tab>Na, wir werden schon irgendwie Freunde werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000770_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Now that we are all caught up, to the matter at hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000770_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Entschuldigt, aber ich möchte euch etwas fragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As we were about to resume our search in the void, I felt the presence of my sister Azdaja in the Source. Somewhere in the far north─perhaps even here in Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich habe im Norden von Ilsabard, also gen Garlemald, etwas gespürt: die Präsenz meiner Schwester Azdaja.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If you have seen or heard anything out of the ordinary, I must know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Habt ihr hier irgendetwas bemerkt, das damit zusammenhängen könnte?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>As a matter of fact, we may have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ein Hinweis auf einen Drachen, der eigentlich in der dreizehnten Splitter<var 16 /var>welt sein sollte? ... Hm, ja, da war etwas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>In recent days, we have had to contend with a surprising number of voidsent. And not the lesser kind that occasionally manifest, but ones possessed of considerable power.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vor ein paar Tagen sind hier Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te erschienen. Keine der niederen: Sie waren stark und nicht gerade wenige.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>You think they might have been summoned? By whom?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Hast du irgendeine Ahnung, wer sie befehligt oder gerufen haben könnte?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're not sure. But as Jullus reminded us, practitioners of a certain traditional Garlean art rely upon voidsent servants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus hat uns erzählt, dass im alten Garlemald Versuche unternommen wurden, die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten zu kontrollieren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>The very same I believe you have mastered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dir sollte das bekannt vorkommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>While there are no known reapers left in Garlemald, we can't rule out the possibility that some are working in secret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jetzt aber ist die Technik hier weitestgehend verloren gegangen. Es ist natürlich nicht auszuschließen, dass sich doch irgendwie irgendjemand dieses Wissen angeeignet hat und über die Macht verfügt, Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te zu kontrollieren.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000860_ESTINIEN<tab>To summon not one, but several powerful voidsent, is no small feat. But if Azdaja was indeed called from the void...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000860_ESTINIEN<tab>Ja, aber hochrangige Nichtswesen, und dazu noch ein Hoher Drache? Das ist keine geringe Leistung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Then it is likely the same party is responsible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000870_YSHTOLA<tab>Jedenfalls ist es kein Werk, das man einfach so vollbringt. Sie könnten zwar auch durch einen natürlichen Riss gekommen sein ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Alternatively, the aetheric confluence at the Tower of Babil may have triggered an expansion of natural fissures one could use to cross over, but I think that improbable if not impossible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>Und es ist durchaus denkbar, dass der Turm von Babil, als er seine Unmengen an Äther aufnahm, solch einen Riss erweiterte. Aber das halte ich für unwahrscheinlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000890_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Then we must assume these events have indeed been orchestrated.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000890_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Also können wir davon ausgehen, dass jemand ein Portal geöffnet hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Well, summoned or no, we've been trying to track them to their origin. It's the mountains to the east, we think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Wir haben uns auch gefragt, woher genau die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten kommen, und glauben, dass sie von den Bergen im Osten herabgestiegen sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000910_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Can you guide us there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000910_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Dann sollten wir uns sofort dort umsehen. Bestimmt finden wir ein Nichtsportal oder dessen Überreste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would, but the terrain is too difficult to traverse on foot. Nor is flying an option due to the winds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Allerdings kommt man in den verschneiten Bergen zu Fuß nicht weit. Außerdem toben dort un<var 16 /var>be<var 16 /var>rechen<var 16 /var>bare Winde, die die Suche per Luftschiff zu einem gefährlichen Wagnis machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Too much ground to cover in any case. Is there no way to narrow it down?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000930_ESTINIEN<tab>Lässt sich das Suchgebiet nicht irgendwie eingrenzen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is one place we thought to look first: an isolated village rumored to have once been home to a reaper order.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000940_ALPHINAUD<tab>Darüber habe ich auch nachgedacht. Einen Anhaltspunkt gibt es: ein abgelegenes Dorf, tief in den Bergen. Man sagt, dass diejenigen mit der Gabe, die Nichtswesen zu kontrollieren, einst dort lebten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>That would indeed make an excellent start. Though the question of how to get there remains.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000950_YSHTOLA<tab>Warum sagst du das nicht gleich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus may be of assistance. Let us return to Camp Broken Glass and consult him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dann brauchen wir nur noch ein Fortbewegungsmittel. Und ich weiß auch schon, wer uns da weiterhelfen könnte: Jullus im Camp Splitterglas!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000970_ALISAIE<tab>What was it you wished to talk about?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000970_ALISAIE<tab>Du wolltest mich etwas fragen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Why do you help these people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Warum helft ihr bei dem Aufbau von Garlemald?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What is it that you stand to gain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_000990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Welchen Nutzen zieht ihr daraus, den Schwachen zu helfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001000_ALISAIE<tab>I'm sorry?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001000_ALISAIE<tab>Nutzen ...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You don't act on behalf of a higher power, nor are you bound by a contract. In spite of this, you help them. Why?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Niemand befiehlt es dir, niemand kontrolliert dich. Warum nimmst du dann freiwillig diese Mühen auf dich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001020_ALISAIE<tab>And there I thought it was something serious...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001020_ALISAIE<tab>Ich hatte mir schon gedacht, dass du so was fragst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001030_ALISAIE<tab>I help them because I want to. Because it's the right thing to do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001030_ALISAIE<tab>Ich habe mich einfach dazu entschieden. Ich will mein Bestes geben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...But what do you stand to gain? You didn't answer the question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001040_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Das ist keine Antwort. Was bekommst du dafür, wenn du diesen Leuten hilfst?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001050_ALISAIE<tab>Didn't I? I followed my heart. What I got out of it came after.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001050_ALISAIE<tab>Du verstehst mich nicht. Ich erfülle mir einen Wunsch, wenn ich mein Bestes gebe. Und wenn es jemandem hilft, dann umso besser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001060_ALISAIE<tab>Was there anything else? If not, let's keep moving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001060_ALISAIE<tab>War das alles? Dann lass uns weitergehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja. Gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>To act not out of obligation or in pursuit of gain. To simply...live. And they survive like this...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Sein Bestes zu geben, auch wenn es keinen direkten Nutzen hat. Ist es das, was diese Welt bewegt?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001090_ALISAIE<tab>All finished, are we? Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001090_ALISAIE<tab>Das war der letzte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001100_ALISAIE<tab>The cold doesn't let up out here, does it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001100_ALISAIE<tab>Es ist so kalt wie eh und je.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001110_ALISAIE<tab>They've the means to keep everyone warm at Camp Broken Glass and Tertium. But the measures are still only temporary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001110_ALISAIE<tab>Im Tertium oder in Camp Splitterglas hat man vor den eisigen Winden Schutz, aber immer nur für einen Moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Subsisting on charity, dreading the day the sympathy of others is exhausted─it's no way to live. They need lasting safety and security.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001120_ALISAIE<tab>Jullus hat einmal davon gesprochen, wie warm Garlemald früher war. Und er hat Recht: Die Garlear brauchen Häuser, in denen sie sich geborgen fühlen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001130_ALISAIE<tab>Though things will never be as they once were...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001130_ALISAIE<tab>Natürlich können wir nicht alles so aufbauen, wie es früher war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001140_ALISAIE<tab>If we can restore a modicum of normalcy to their lives, maybe that will be enough for them to move forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001140_ALISAIE<tab>Aber wenn es erstmal nur einen Ort gäbe, an den sie sich zurückziehen und das Geschehene verarbeiten könnten, würden sie auch klarer in die Zukunft sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001150_ALISAIE<tab>If we're to achieve that, we have to work harder. I have to work harder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001150_ALISAIE<tab>Wir müssen alles dafür tun, damit dieser Traum Wirklichkeit wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're doing your best. Anyone can see that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Du gibst doch schon dein Bestes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Just try not to overdo it, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Übernimm dich nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001160_ALISAIE<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001160_ALISAIE<tab>Oh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001170_ALISAIE<tab>L-Lest you misunderstand, I wasn't fishing for a compliment... As I said, I'm doing this because I want to.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001170_ALISAIE<tab>Ach, hör auf. Ich sag doch: Ich tu einfach nur, was ich tun muss.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001180_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your support.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001180_ALISAIE<tab>Aber danke für das Lob.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001190_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, come now, you think I don't know my own limits?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001190_ALISAIE<tab>Tu ich doch gar nicht! Ich mache nur, was nötig ist!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001200_ALISAIE<tab>Still...I appreciate your concern.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001200_ALISAIE<tab>Aber danke, dass du dir Sorgen machst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001210_ALISAIE<tab>Well, our work here is done. We should be heading back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001210_ALISAIE<tab>Die Arbeit hier wäre erledigt. Gehen wir zurück ins Tertium!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001220_ALISAIE<tab>I hope Alphinaud and Zero haven't gotten into any trouble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001220_ALISAIE<tab>Hoffentlich sind Alphinaud und Zero auch wohlbehalten heimgekehrt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001230_ALISAIE<tab>I cannot imagine how awful it must have been to serve as Zenos's avatar. To not only suffer him, but so much else...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001230_ALISAIE<tab>Es ist schon seltsam: Ein Nichtswesen, das einen Pakt mit Zenos eingeht, stellt man sich irgendwie anders vor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001240_ALISAIE<tab>She's a fighter all right. Like you and me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001240_ALISAIE<tab>Ich glaub, wir werden wirklich noch Freunde!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001250_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at Tertium...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001250_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Währenddessen im Tertium ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001260_HUNGARYGARLEAN10320<tab>Thank you, miss. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001260_HUNGARYGARLEAN10320<tab>Danke.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>This feels...strangely familiar...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001270_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Wie lange habe ich das nicht gehört ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001280_RESTLESSGARLEAN10320<tab>Excuse me, Alphinaud. My wife, she's come down with a high fever. Do you think you could take a look at her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001280_RESTLESSGARLEAN10320<tab>Herr Alphinaud. Meine Frau leidet an einem Fieber. Könnt Ihr nicht irgendwie helfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. Give me a moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir kümmern uns um sie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Zero, may I leave the rest here to you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kann ich das dir überlassen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Fine by me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001310_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja. Das schaffe ich schon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001320_JULLUS<tab>Thank you again for your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001320_JULLUS<tab>Danke für die Lieferung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001330_JULLUS<tab>Er...Zero, was it? I take it you're one of Alphinaud's comrades?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001330_JULLUS<tab>Du bist Zero, richtig? Bist du eine von Alphinauds Gefährten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Comrade...? We've entered into a cooperative pact, if that's what you mean.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001340_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Gefährten ... Das sagt man, wenn man sich unabhängig von Vor- und Nachteilen einem gemeinsamen Ziel verschrieben hat, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001350_JULLUS<tab>Pact? No, no, nothing so formal. What I mean is, you must know each other well. Be on good terms, enjoy each other's company─that sort of thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001350_JULLUS<tab>Was? Äh, ja. Ich wollte fragen, ob du zu ihm gehörst. Zu seiner Organisation. Oder ob du öfters mit ihm unterwegs bist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Then no, he's not my comrade. I have none. Nor will I ever, I think.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001360_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dann muss ich wohl verneinen. Weder waren noch sind wir Gefährten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001370_JULLUS<tab>Oh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001370_JULLUS<tab>Na gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Did I say something odd?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001380_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Stimmt etwas nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001390_JULLUS<tab>No, not at all. On the contrary, it makes sense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001390_JULLUS<tab>Hm? Nein. So wichtig ist es auch nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001400_JULLUS<tab>When Alphinaud and the contingent first arrived, we rejected them out of hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001400_JULLUS<tab>Als dieses Korps hier einzog, waren die Garlear ziemlich misstrauisch - ich eingeschlossen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001410_JULLUS<tab>Whatever they may have claimed, they were the enemy. Savages with their savage ways. To accept their help was to admit defeat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001410_JULLUS<tab>Sie haben die richtigen Sachen gesagt ... Aber sie kamen aus einem anderen Land, hatten andere Sitten und eine andere Denkweise. Uns mit ihnen zusammenzutun, kam uns vor, als wären wir von ihnen besiegt worden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001420_JULLUS<tab>But no matter how poorly we treated them, they didn't turn their backs on us. They stayed and listened.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001420_JULLUS<tab>Wir wiesen sie ab. Aber dann merkten wir, dass sie uns zuhörten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001430_JULLUS<tab>That's just the kind of people they are. Makes sense they'd get along with someone like you, who tries to push others away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001430_JULLUS<tab>Du willst mit anderen nichts zu tun haben. Aber sie, sie meinen es gut mit dir. Du solltest ihnen eine Chance geben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get along? I'm upholding my part of the bargain. There's nothing more to it than that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001440_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich will nichts von ihnen. Ich bin nur hier, weil ich einen Pakt geschlossen habe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001450_JULLUS<tab>If you say so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001450_JULLUS<tab>Das kann schon sein, aber ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001460_JULLUS<tab>Ah, I'd nearly forgotten why I came. Are you hungry?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001460_JULLUS<tab>Ach, fast hätt ich's vergessen: Hast du Hunger?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001470_JULLUS<tab>We all get rations, and considering the work you're doing, you're as good as one of us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001470_JULLUS<tab>Eigentlich ist die Essenslieferung ja für die Garlear. Aber du hast so fleißig mit angepackt, dass dir auch etwas zusteht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I am running low on aether... Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001480_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja, mein Körperäther könnte wirklich etwas Nachschub vertragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001490_JULLUS<tab>Azim Steppe-style dumplings. Buuz, they call them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001490_JULLUS<tab>Das hat uns das Korps gegeben: eine Buuds aus der Azim-Steppe. Schmeckt so ähnlich wie gedämpftes Piroschki.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001500_JULLUS<tab>Never had a dumpling? It's like...a kind of bread stuffed with a filling─meat or vegetables usually─that you bake or steam.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001500_JULLUS<tab>Piroschki ist typisch garleische Hausmannskost. Meine Mutter hat es immer für uns gemacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001510_JULLUS<tab>We have our own recipes in Garlemald, too. My mother liked to make them. My brother and sister always fought over the jam-filled ones...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001510_JULLUS<tab>Ein bisschen Fleisch, etwas Gemüse, schön in einem duftenden Teigmantel gedämpft ... Einfach köstlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001520_JULLUS<tab>J-Just think of it as bread, all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001520_JULLUS<tab>Was red ich denn da! Also ... Äh ... Iss es einfach. Es ist gut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001530_JULLUS<tab>I should warn you, though, they're spicy─helps them keep longer, I assume. Too much for the children to handle, though.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001530_JULLUS<tab>Für Kinder ist es etwas zu würzig, deswegen haben wir es bekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Interesting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001540_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Das ist ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001550_JULLUS<tab>Interesting good or interesting...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001550_JULLUS<tab>Zu würzig?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I don't know much about taste. Not anymore. But I do feel a sensation in my mouth.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001560_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich weiß nicht. Ich kenne noch nicht so viele Geschmäcker. Aber ... ich verstehe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001570_JULLUS<tab>Is that a bad thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001570_JULLUS<tab>Magst du es nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Not necessarily.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001580_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Doch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001590_JULLUS<tab>Heh, that's enough for me. I've heard it said that spices are more akin to fire than flavors. Perhaps that makes them easier to understand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001590_JULLUS<tab>Dann ist ja gut. Manche mögen es nicht, wenn das Essen zu stark gewürzt ist. Aber wenn's dir gefällt, bin ich beruhigt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Jullus. Getting acquainted with Zero, are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001600_ALISAIE<tab>Jullus, du bist ja auch wieder da. Machen Zero und du gerade Pause?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001610_JULLUS<tab>Um...ah... I-I suppose I am...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001610_JULLUS<tab>Wir? Äh ... Ja, so ist es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001620_ALISAIE<tab>No harm in that. Acquaint away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001620_ALISAIE<tab>Es geht doch nichts über ein Schwätzchen bei gutem Essen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, everyone is here. Excellent. Thank you all for your hard work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hallo! Danke für eure Hilfe heute. Besonders dir, Zero.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>I've just finished up myself. Shall we go and find Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ich hab auch alles erledigt. Wenn wir uns ausgeruht haben, sollten wir nach Estinien und den anderen sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001650_GARLEANSOLDIER10320<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001650_GARLEANSOLDIER10320<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie! Kommt schnell!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001660_JULLUS<tab>Report!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001660_JULLUS<tab>Hier Jullus. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001670_JULLUS<tab>Lost contact? When?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001670_JULLUS<tab>Eine der Versorgungseinheiten ist noch nicht eingetroffen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001680_JULLUS<tab>Voidsent─I'd bet my life on it. Understood. I'll investigate at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001680_JULLUS<tab>Dann wurde sie wahrscheinlich von Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten angegriffen ... Verstanden. Ich kümmere mich darum.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001690_JULLUS<tab>A unit transporting supplies has gone silent en route to Broken Glass. I will go and search for it. Stay here and keep watch, but be ready to answer my call.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001690_JULLUS<tab>Ich gehe selbst. Wir können hier jetzt keine Soldaten entbehren. Wenn ich Verstärkung brauche, melde ich mich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>If it was voidsent, you'd be a fool to go alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001700_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Warte. Die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten kommen in Scharen und sind extrem gefährlich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>They'll find you before you find your men. And then they'll devour you as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001710_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Glaubst du wirklich, dass du ihnen alleine gewachsen bist?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001720_JULLUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001720_JULLUS<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001730_JULLUS<tab>Perhaps you're right. Perhaps I don't stand a chance. But I can't just abandon them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001730_JULLUS<tab>Es ist mir egal, wie stark der Feind ist. Ich habe es satt, meine Leute sterben zu sehen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I can't repay you for the bread if you're dead. I'll go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001740_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Dann werde ich gehen. Sieh es als Ausgleich für die Buuds.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001750_JULLUS<tab>What!? No! I couldn't possibly ask you to do that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001750_JULLUS<tab>Nein. Es ist zu gefährlich. Du bleibst hier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I'm far better suited to dealing with voidsent. It makes sense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001760_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Für dich ist es gefährlicher als für mich. Ich kenne die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Or do you mean to say you'd rather I stay here because you can't protect this place on your own?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001770_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Oder glaubst du, dass du diesen Stützpunkt ohne mich nicht verteidigen könntest?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001780_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001780_JULLUS<tab>Hmpf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001785_JULLUS<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001785_JULLUS<tab>Haa ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001790_JULLUS<tab>Fine. Just...don't do anything stupid. Promise me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001790_JULLUS<tab>Versprich mir, dass du sofort kehrt machst, wenn es brenzlig wird.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001800_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Grrr... Damn these demons!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001800_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Verdammt! Das ist das Ende!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Return to the camp. Now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001810_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich übernehme das. Macht, dass ihr ins Lager zurückkommt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001820_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Y-Yes, ma'am! Thank you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001820_GARLEANSOLDIER10410<tab>Danke! Du hast uns das Leben gerettet!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001830_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Kindred... Why do you interfere?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001830_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Warum hilfst du ihnen? Du bist wie wir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001840_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Ah, of course. You sold your soul to feed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001840_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Ah, ein Pakt. Hast du deine Seele verkauft, um Äther zu bekommen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001845_VOIDSENT10410<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001845_VOIDSENT10410<tab>Uah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I have taken bread. But my soul is forever mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001850_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Es war eine Buuds, um genau zu sein. Und meine Seele, die gehört mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001860_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Verdammt ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001870_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>How big must the gate be for their like to come through...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001870_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Diese Nichtswesen ... Das Portal muss riesig sein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001880_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Is this it, then...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001880_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich ... Es ist vorbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Just like that time...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001890_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Es ist genau wie damals ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>When Light still shone upon the world... When the Contramemoria still raged...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001900_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja. Damals ... als die Welt noch von Licht erhellt war. Als wir den Memoriakrieg fochten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001910_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stand aside if you value your life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001910_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Mach Platz, wenn dir dein Leben lieb ist. Wir haben in dem Dorf etwas zu erledigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001920_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>We're only after women and wine. Darkness can take the rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001920_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>Wir nehmen uns Wein und Weib, und der Rest soll in Dunkelheit versinken.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001930_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You're not taking another step towards that village.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001930_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>An mir kommt ihr nicht vorbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001940_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Stupid girl. You were warned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001940_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Na, wenn sie es unbedingt mit uns allen aufnehmen will ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001945_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001945_MEMORIAMASTERA10430<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001950_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hrng!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001955_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001955_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hargh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001956_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>Gotcha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001956_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>In die Leere mit dir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001957_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001957_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Uah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001958_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>And now we can get back to our business.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001958_MEMORIAMASTERB10430<tab>Jetzt beginnt der Spaß!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001960_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Uh ... Ah ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Get up... Get up, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001970_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nein ... Nein!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Too weak. I need...help...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001980_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ist denn da<var 1D /var>... niemand<var 1D /var>... der mir helfen kann?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Someone...please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_001990_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bitte ... Ich brauche Hilfe ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>The same mistakes, the same ends. Again and again. What should I...what could I have done?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002000_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Das Schicksal wiederholt sich. Und ich muss mich fragen: Hätte ich es besser machen können?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002010_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Was?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Who?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ist da wer?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You... What are you doing here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002030_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Bist du das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002040_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola and Estinien had matters well in hand. So we went where we were needed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002040_ALISAIE<tab>Wir haben unsere alle erledigt, also wollten wir nach dir sehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kannst du aufstehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're not finished yet, Zero. Let's fight together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir halten zusammen, Zero!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We're a little late, but we've come to help you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wir sind hier, um dir zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...All right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002060_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja, ich weiß.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I will let it burn, this fire in my breast. Let it burn and rage and guide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002070_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich spüre es in meiner Brust. Ein Feuer. Und es gefällt mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>You did well to find me out here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002080_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Wie habt ihr mich gefunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have Jullus to thank for that. He was quite worried when he called.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Jullus hat uns kontaktiert und um Verstärkung gebeten. Er klang ganz schön besorgt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>There would've been more casualties if not for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Das war Rettung in letzter Sekunde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The people of Garlemald thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Gut, dass wir dich haben, Zero.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>No, if it was not for you and the others, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002100_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Nein ... Das sollte ich doch sagen ... Also ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Well, let's not fuss over details. We should return to Tertium─can you make it that far?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Na? Wollen wir nicht nachsehen, wie es um das Tertium steht? Kannst du laufen, Zero?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>I think so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002120_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ja, geht schon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002130_JULLUS<tab>Zero! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002130_JULLUS<tab>Zero! Ist alles in Ordnung?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Well enough. No voidsent struck here, did they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002140_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Es ist nicht so schlimm. Wie es aussieht, haben euch die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten hier in Ruhe gelassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002150_JULLUS<tab>No, and there weren't any more casualties thanks to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002150_JULLUS<tab>Ja. Dank deiner beherzten Heldentat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab> Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002160_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ah ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What are you doing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002170_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Was soll das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002180_JULLUS<tab>You'll have no debts to repay, if that's what you're worried about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002180_JULLUS<tab>Keine Sorge, ich will dir nur helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002190_JULLUS<tab>If anything, I owe you a week's worth of buuz.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002190_JULLUS<tab>Denn die Buuds, die hast du doppelt und dreifach zurückgezahlt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002200_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Heh.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002210_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Hah hah hah! All shall cower before the might of Archfiend Cagnazzo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002210_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Ich bin Cagnazzo, Elementarfürst des Wassers! Muahahahaaa! Lassen wir den Spaß beginnen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002220_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tell me one thing, Cagnazzo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002220_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Du bist also Cagnazzo. Ich will dich etwas fragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>A dragon of our world crossed over into yours long ago, but I have felt her presence here again. What is the meaning of this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002230_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Vor langer Zeit ist ein Drache in deine Welt gereist. Ich habe gespürt, dass er nun wieder zurückgekehrt ist. Wenn du etwas darüber weißt, dann sag es.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002240_WATERMONOLITH<tab>I daresay what you felt...was this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002240_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Hahaha. War es nicht vielleicht das hier, was du gespürt hast?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002250_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>By the Sisters...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002250_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Das ist ja ... ihr ...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002260_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>You... What have you done to Azdaja!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002260_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ihr ... Was habt ihr mit ihr gemacht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002270_WATERMONOLITH<tab>If you want answers, you'll have to get them from Lord Golbez.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002270_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Hehehe. Wenn du etwas über den Drachen wissen willst, musst du schon Golbez persönlich fragen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002280_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Assuming you've the strength to face him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002280_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Wenn du es bis zu ihm schaffst, meine ich.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002290_WATERMONOLITH<tab>A pity I will not see the plan to fruition, but my part is done. And to fade with the thrill of battle in my heart makes it all the more worthwhile...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002290_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Mein Werk ist getan. Ich würde ja zu gern sehen, wie das alles ausgeht, aber wenigstens durfte ich noch einmal in die eisigen Fluten des Kampfes tauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002300_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>No, wait! Where is she!? Where is my sister!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002300_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Warte ... Warte! Wo ist meine Schwester?!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002310_WATERMONOLITH<tab>At long last, I go to join the great flow...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002310_WATERMONOLITH<tab>Und damit kehre ich in den Kreislauf des Lebens zurück ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>By the gate's closing, there can be no doubt that he was the one who opened it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002320_YSHTOLA<tab>Das war Cagnazzos Portal. Es verschwindet mit seinem Erschaffer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002330_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Oh, Azdaja... I prayed we might meet once more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002330_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Schwester ... Werden wir uns jemals wiedersehen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002340_ESTINIEN<tab>She is likely still in the void. Take heart─we will find her yet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002340_ESTINIEN<tab>Wenn es wirklich das Auge war, was du gespürt hast, dann ist deine Schwester noch in der anderen Welt. Wir werden sie finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>So, what now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002350_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Was sollen wir jetzt machen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you discuss how to proceed with your search, I would excuse myself to look around. There may be salvage that we could use at the camp.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir sehen uns in dieser Siedlung um. Wir finden bestimmt etwas, das wir für den Wieder<var 16 /var>aufbau gebrauchen können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002370_ALISAIE<tab>In that case, I'll patrol the area for more voidsent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002370_ALISAIE<tab>Ich werde sicherstellen, dass sich hier nicht noch mehr Nichtswesen herumtreiben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>Very well, let us take a moment to consider our options.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002380_YSHTOLA<tab>Also, sehen wir uns um.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Is Vrtra not back yet?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Ist Vrtra noch nicht hier?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>My apologies for the delay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002400_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Tut mir leid, dass ihr so lange warten musstet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>Ist dein Kopf wieder klarer?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I am. As distressing as this turn of events was, the eye itself gives me cause to hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002420_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ja. Ich habe meine Schwester nicht gefunden, aber dafür habe ich eines ihrer Augen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>While it is no longer possessed of Azdaja's will, it may yet lead us to her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002430_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Das ist wenigstens eine Spur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Were it not for your encouragement, I would never have dared to embark on my search, much less come this far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002440_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ohne euch hätte ich das nicht geschafft. Danke, dass ihr mir geholfen habt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002450_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will not lose faith. I will find my sister, wheresoever she may be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002450_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich werde weitermachen. Ich werde wieder ins Nichts gehen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>We'll return the eye to her together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>Wir werden sie finden, und sie wird ihr Auge zurückbekommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>Though tainted, the eye has not fully succumbed to Darkness. Azdaja herself may have been able to resist its influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002470_YSHTOLA<tab>Der Äther in diesem Auge ist von der Dunkelheit in Mitleidenschaft gezogen worden, aber er hat seine wahre Natur nicht eingebüßt. Ich bin mir sicher, dass Azdaja standhält und noch nicht zu einem Nichtswesen geworden ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Well, as much as we'd love to take part in your next foray, we can't abandon our efforts here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Wir würden auch gerne helfen, aber wir können Garlemald jetzt nicht im Stich lassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. We'll need to keep a close watch in case the voidgate opens again as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Außerdem muss jemand aufpassen, ob sich wieder ein Portal öffnet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though should it prove safe to do so, I have some ideas for how we might put this village to use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wir bleiben also hier und überwachen die Aufbauarbeiten. Vielleicht lernen wir sogar etwas über das versteckte Dorf, wenn wir die Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten beobachten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>Do what you must. We will manage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002510_ESTINIEN<tab>Ja, macht das ruhig. Das Nichts könnt ihr getrost uns überlassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002520_YSHTOLA<tab>To free Azdaja, I expect we will have to deal with Golbez once and for all─after which you may undertake your work without worry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002520_YSHTOLA<tab>Wenn wir Azdaja aus Golbez' Händen befreien, werden er und die Elementarfürsten keine Portale mehr erschaffen können. Dann könnt ihr euch ganz um den Wieder<var 16 /var>aufbau kümmern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>We look forward to the glad tidings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gut. Dann warten wir hier auf eure Erfolgsmeldung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002540_ALISAIE<tab>You'll take good care of everyone, won't you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002540_ALISAIE<tab>Zero. Pass bitte gut auf meine Freunde auf.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>What? Why do you ask me this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002550_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich? Warum?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Because comrades look out for one another, and I can't think of anyone more qualified to keep them safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Weil Freunde aufeinander achtgeben. Und das sind wir ja jetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>True. I will do no less than I've promised.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002570_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich ... Ich werde gehen, so wie abgemacht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>If our respective plans are settled, then let us head back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Also dann. Kehren wir zum Fuß des Berges zurück.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>If everyone is ready, then let us depart for Alzadaal's Legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002590_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Alles ist bereit. Also dann, auf ins Nichts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What was that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002600_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Was war das für ein Licht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>A deluge of aether. The mark of a terrible magick.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>Der Ätherstoß war immens! Da wurde ein gewaltiger Zauber gewirkt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002620_ESTINIEN<tab>It wasn't far from here. Let's go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002620_ESTINIEN<tab>So weit war es nicht weg. Sehen wir uns das an!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002630_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Hey, you! Stop! If you're thinking of taking to sea─don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002630_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Wartet! Wartet! Haltet euch vom Wasser fern!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002640_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>What has happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002640_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Was ist passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002650_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>We were out working our nets when a light suddenly shot up over Bhaflau Isle with a boom!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002650_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Ich hab einen Lichtstrahl von der Insel Bhaflau emporschießen sehen, und dann hat's auch schon geknallt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002660_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>A massive fiend then took to the skies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002660_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Und dann, dann hat sich von da, wo die Insel war, ein großes Ungeheuer in die Luft geschwungen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002670_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Another blasphemy, we feared─but we didn't linger to find out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002670_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Ich dachte, das ist eine Endzeitbestie, und bin gelaufen, was die Beine hergaben!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Did you see where it was headed?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002680_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Wohin ist das Ungeheuer geflogen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002690_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Can't say for sure, but it looked like it was northward bound.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002690_PANICFISHERMAN10720<tab>Das kann ich nicht genau sagen. Richtung Norden, glaube ich. Ich hab es noch abschwenken sehen, aber dann bin ich nur noch gerannt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002700_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I see... Our thanks for the warning, and do not let us keep you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002700_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Du hast uns sehr geholfen. Vielen Dank.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Bhaflau Isle is connected to Alzadaal's Legacy. This cannot be a coincidence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002710_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Bhaflau war eine kleine Insel, die mit den Ruinen auf dem Meeresboden verbunden war.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002720_YSHTOLA<tab>In response to Cagnazzo's defeat, they have come for our gate...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002720_YSHTOLA<tab>Ob der Angriff unserem Portal galt? Er ist direkt nach der Begegnung mit Cagnazzo erfolgt und trug eindeutig die Handschrift der Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002730_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>So it seems. I would ascertain the situation at the vault, but the fiend must be dealt with ere people come to harm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002730_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ja. Eigentlich möchte ich schnellst<var 16 /var>möglich zur Schatzkammer, aber wir müssen uns um dieses geflügelte Ungeheuer kümmern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002740_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I shall assume my dragon form and seek it out at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002740_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich werde meine eigentliche Gestalt annehmen und mich über den Wolken umsehen. Wir müssen herausfinden, um was es sich bei diesem Monstrum handelt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>Wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>Warte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>You heard the fisherman. A blasphemy, they called it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>Hast du den Mann von eben schon vergessen? Er glaubte, eine Endzeitbestie gesehen zu haben, und das hat ihn in Panik versetzt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>If another flying creature were sighted now, others will assume the worst, and panic will spread. This is not the way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>Bei allem Respekt: Ich halte es für unklug, wenn jetzt ein weiteres ... geflügeltes Geschöpf am Himmel seine Kreise zieht. In Zeiten wie diesen ist der Magistrat gefragt, und der sitzt im Meghaduta-Tempel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll see to the fiend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde die Verfolgung aufnehmen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We can work together on this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wenn wir uns aufteilen, erreichen wir mehr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>...You are right, Estinien.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002780_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Verzeiht. Ihr habt natürlich Recht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>I will gather my soldiers and search the isle for casualties.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002790_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Dann kehre ich zum Meghaduta-Tempel zurück und werde mit den Kriegern des Himmelsheers nachsehen, welche Schäden die Explosion angerichtet hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002800_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>As you wish, the fiend is yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002800_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Ich würde mich freuen, wenn du dich im Norden der Insel auf die Suche nach dem Monstrum machen könntest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002810_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The fiend, I leave to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002810_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>In dem Fall wäre es hilfreich, wenn du dich im Norden der Insel auf die Suche nach dem Monstrum machen könntest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002820_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>The hunt will go more swiftly with help. Zero, might I prevail upon you to accompany <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002820_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Wir könnten noch etwas Unterstützung gebrauchen. Ich wollte eigentlich Zero fragen, aber ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>...Very well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002830_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Einverstanden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>Then Estinien and I will make for Alzadaal's Legacy and secure the gate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002840_YSHTOLA<tab>Dann werden Estinien und ich uns die Schatzkammer ansehen. Wir müssen wissen, wie es um das Portal steht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Stay on your guard. The enemy is clever and will have anticipated our response.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002850_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Danke. Aber seid vorsichtig. Es können jederzeit wieder Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te auftauchen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Be safe, my friends, and may the Sisters guide your steps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002860_VARSHAHNBIG<tab>Also dann. Wir treffen uns später am Meghaduta-Tempel wieder. Und vergesst nicht: Geht keine unnötigen Risiken ein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Hello? Can you hear me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Hier Y'shtola. Hörst du mich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)We were too late. The vault has been destroyed, the alchemical furnace with it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Schlechte Nachrichten. Das Nichtsportal in Webers Wehr wurde mitsamt der Schatzkammer zerstört.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)This was their true objective─to deny us entry into the void.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Golbez wollte verhindern, dass wir in die dreizehnte Splitter<var 16 /var>welt reisen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Cagnazzo and Azdaja's eye were a diversion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Cagnazzo war nur ein Ablenkungsmanöver. Golbez hat das Auge benutzt, um sich Zeit zu verschaffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)A means to detain us in Garlemald while they went to work here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002910_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Damit er einen Trupp in die Schatzkammer schicken kann, der unser Portal zerstört.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)To reduce the vault to rubble... That which you hunt is no ordinary foe. Have care.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002920_YSHTOLA<tab>(-Y'shtola-)Sieh dich vor. Dein Gegner verfügt über ungeahnte Kräfte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002930_FIREMONOLITH<tab>(-???-)Such an exquisite sight... A canvas of vibrant colors. As was our world too, once...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002930_FIREMONOLITH<tab>(-???-)Was für ein wunderschöner Anblick. Früher war unsere Welt auch so farbenfroh.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>One of Golbez's champions, I presume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Es war das Werk der Elementarfürsten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Are you the one who destroyed the treasure vault?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Warst du es?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002940_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I am. Rubicante, the archfiend of fire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002940_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Ja. Ich, Rubicante, einer der Elementarfürsten, habe es getan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002950_FIREMONOLITH<tab>A monster in flesh, yet in spirit I remain a man. A prisoner of the past.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002950_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Ich, der erbärmliche Rubicante, verwandelt und doch noch nicht vollständig dem Bösen verfallen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002960_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Such tears I wept when Darkness consumed the world. Until Lord Golbez came and spoke of salvation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002960_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Als die Welt im Dunkel versunken war und ich jede Hoffnung verloren hatte, erschien mir Golbez und versprach Rettung.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002970_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Thus do I walk proudly at his side, to see his dream fulfilled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002970_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Ich wurde sein rechter Arm und lebte, um sein Werk zu vollenden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002980_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Your heart is pure. For benevolent cause you seek the dragon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002980_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Ha ... An dir erkenne ich nichts Bösartiges. Eure Suche nach dem Drachen ist gewiss ein edles Unterfangen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002990_FIREMONOLITH<tab>But I cannot allow you to have it─cannot allow you to interfere. If you would continue, then there is but one recourse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_002990_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Aber ich werde ihn euch nicht überlassen! Denn ihr steht der Vollendung unseres Werkes im Weg, und das kann ich nicht zulassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003000_FIREMONOLITH<tab>I shall await you at the summit. Come, mortal! Come and weigh your righteousness against mine!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003000_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Ich erwarte dich auf dem Gipfel, <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> der fremden Welt! Komm. Komm, und kämpfe!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003010_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You stayed the course─as I knew you would. As too will I. Come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003010_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Du bist also gekommen, <var 08 E905 ((Kriegerin)) ((Krieger)) /var> der fremden Welt. Entfachen wir die Flammen des Kampfes!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>It seems I was a step too slow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003020_MYSTERIOUSPERSON<tab>Ich bin zu spät ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003030_FIREMONOLITH<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003030_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Haa ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003040_FIREMONOLITH<tab>To defeat all of us archfiends... You are strong indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003040_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Du bist wirklich stark. Stärker noch als wir Fürsten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What is it that Golbez seeks?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was will Golbez wirklich?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why do you fight? What is it that you wish to save?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was versuchst du zu retten?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003050_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know my lord's true purpose?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003050_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Was er will, möchtest du wissen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003060_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. The knowledge will not change the outcome. Listen, then, and learn how all began...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003060_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Gut, ich werde es dir sagen. Ihr könnt es sowieso nicht mehr aufhalten. Es begann folgendermaßen ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003070_FIREMONOLITH<tab>You would know your enemy's heart?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003070_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Dein Interesse schmeichelt mir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003080_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Very well. It bleeds more than you can ever understand, but I will speak, and you will listen, and learn how all began...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003080_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Also gut. Ich werde dir sagen, wie alles begann ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>How long has it been since the world was undone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003090_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Vor vielen Jahren versank diese Welt in Dunkelheit ...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Since Light and life gave way to Darkness and undeath. Since we were reduced to beasts befouled, squabbling over what scant aether remains...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003100_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Was einst von tiefer Schönheit war, ist nun tosendes Chaos. Alles Leben ist zur Abart verkommen und kämpft um die spärlichen Reste des Äthers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>But you are different. You remember who you were, and the paradise for which you fought.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003110_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Aber ihr seid anders. Ihr habt nicht vergessen, wer ihr wart und wofür es sich zu kämpfen lohnt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>That world will never be ours again. But we need not suffer in this purgatory of death and rebirth forever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003120_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Diese Welt wird nie wieder sein, was sie einmal war. Und doch können wir der Marter dieser ewigen Existenz entkommen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Join me, and together we shall seek the promised land!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003130_BLACKKNIGHT<tab>Deswegen führe ich euch in ein neues Reich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003140_FIREMONOLITH<tab>There is no hope─no freedom from the wheel. You speak a fantasy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06300_003140_FIREMONOLITH<tab>Wie oft haben wir das schon gehört<var 1D /var>... Versprich nicht, was du nicht halten kannst.
